title: Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts: National Junior Ranger Day
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger     National Junior Ranger Day                National Junior Ranger Day         Wolf Trap's Junior Ranger book and badge are available year round, but special activities are planned for Junior Ranger and National Junior Ranger Days. NPS Photo  Join Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts in celebrating National Junior Ranger Day in 2016, as a part of National Park Week.  Visit the park April 16, 2016 between 10 am and 3 pm to take part in the day's events.  Complete the Centennial Junior Ranger Activity Book to earn the Junior Ranger Centennial Badge Complete the Wolf Trap Junior Ranger booklet to earn a Junior Ranger patch or badge Hike Wolf Trap's TRACK trail and track online  Junior Ranger booklets and other activities will be available at the Ranger Station near the Main Gate to the Filene Center.
